actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for a portion of child support payments, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for a percentage of child support payments. Imposes an additional tax on individuals with substantial unpaid child support obligations.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for a portion of child support payments, and for other purposes.
